Text.Page:
I don't know how something like that could have happened at the Eldritch Academy.

We'll be able to deal with it once the sealing device is functioning again, but until then, we'll need to all work together to keep things under control.

This is terrible. I don't even know what to say.

Well, except the "this is terrible" part. I knew to say that.

Nothing else, though.

I'm deactivate the sealing device's shield.

Once the magic starts, demons will show up to guard it.

You'll have to protect me until my work is doneâ€”can you handle that?"Bring it.""Let's go."
